That error is a throw, not a panic, so we can't do an easy defer/recover.

I suppose we could add recursion depth tracking to treecopy. 

But maybe the best plan for this particular problem is changing the AST for OADD to be like OADDSTRâ€”instead of Left+Right, flatten and use List to store all the Nodes to be added. This is one of many parts of the AST that would benefit from flattening. cc @mdempsky who I believe has been thinking about the future of the AST.
